title: Risen.Anthology.Repack-R.G.Mechanics

Risen.Anthology.Repack-R.G.Mechanics

Risen

Genre : RPG / 3D

Publisher : Deep Silver

System Requirements:


Operating System : Windows XP (SP 3) / Vista
Processor : Pentium 4 2GHz or similar AthlonÃ‚Â®

compatible with DirectX 9.0c (GeForce 7900 or Radeon X1800)

Game information:


Will the all-powerful Inquisition! Listen to the highest decree of the
lord. We have heard rumors that the neighboring island of cursed. In
the jungle opened up the solid earth, and the ancient temple stood on
the remains of forgotten settlements. So - all this dirty slander.
Anyone who dares to leave the city without permission in order to check
the false bike, to be executed. We have already sent a detachment of guards,
and soon find out the details. However, consider what happened eruption.
In the jungle walk is not necessary - some people have not returned. Yes,
their fate will be a lesson to all! A new role-playing game from the
creators of the famous Gothic series immediately attracted the attention
of fans of the genre. Everybody can find something of their own - elegant
style of fighting with swords, powerful spells tremendous opportunities
leveling. From your actions depends on many things - the various factions
try to attract the hero to his side. The abundance of weapons and equipment
will amaze even experienced adventurers. On the localization of the game
worked best actors of our country - you'll be happy to plunge into a series
of incredible adventures, conversations and fierce fighting.


Game Features:

Over 60 hours of gameplay and a lot of passing options.
The Inquisition, the rebels, witches, ancient race - choose your way!
Open space and underground, full of traps, monsters and treasure.


Repack Features:

Risen
Game Version - v1.10
Do not cut / recoded
Option to install the fan patch 1.3
Ability to select a combination of text and voice



Risen 2: Dark Waters

System Requirements:

Operating system : Windows XP (SP), Windows Vista, Windows 7
Processor : Intel Dual Core processor with a clock frequency of 2.1 GHz
Memory : 2 GB
Video : 512 MB Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹(NVIDIA GeForce 7900 GTX / ATI Radeon HD 2600 XT)
Sound Card : Sound device compatible with DirectXÃ‚Â® 9.0
Free space on hard disk : 4.5 GB


Game information:

Game Risen 2: Dark Waters, dedicated to pirate adventures on the
numerous islands, combines the popular classic RPG-mechanics of the
original game Risen with a fresh theme. RPG from a third person in the
dark and gloomy universe, Risen 2: Dark Waters maintains the characteristics
of the first Risen, and offers a variety of options for each task, so each
player can choose the path to your liking. Each variant of the job will
open up new opportunities, ways, abilities and additional skills for the
character. Rich interactive environment and a full cycle of day and night,
affecting many aspects of the game world - that among other things will
allow creators to maximize the effect of presence, which is only possible today.


Game Features:

Sequel to the popular RPG from the developers of the legendary "Gothic".
6 large islands where pirates are enemies of the Inquisition + 1 island in
the appendix "Treasure Island" - only in the Collector's Edition!
About 80 hours of gameplay in the company with the most notorious thugs Archipelago.
Bright dialogues, filled with rude pirate humor.
Rich crafting system: from frightening voodoo dolls to all imaginable varieties of rum.
More than 70 active and passive skills.



Repack Features:

Risen 2: Dark Waters
Version of the game - v1.0.1210.0
Do not cut / recoded
Ability to select a combination of text and voice

Additions:

Pirate Gorge
Treasure Island
Air Temple
